CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper October 21, 1961, pg. A10, reads: "Bridal Shower - The former Shirline Hardy, who recently was married to popular bandleader Joe Westray, was feted at a bridal shower, recently, at the home of the bride's sister. The event was given by Sarah Burney, seated left. Others in the picture include, left to right, seated: Miss Burney, Rachel Barren, Merva Hardy, Margaret Rae, Janice Ellis and Carol Jones. Standing: Mozell Hardy, Carolyn Dickerson, Erma Burney, Mrs. Westray, the honoree; Beverly Young, Carole Ann Gardner, Inez Watson and Delores Burney. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group gathered for bridal shower for Shirline Hardy Westray, seated from left: Sarah Burney, Rachel Barren, Merva Hardy, Margaret Rae, Janice Ellis, Carol Jones; standing: Mozell Hardy, Carolyn Dickerson, Erma Burney, Shirline Hardy Westray, Beverly Young, Carole Ann Gardner, Inez Watson and Delores Burney gathered in basement
